name: Jean D Brigonnet
bio: I'm a driven full-stack software engineer with a passion for startups and a hobby in music. I bring a unique blend of technical expertise and creative thinking to every project. With a track record of successfully delivering high-quality projects on time, I am skilled in a variety of programming languages and have the ability to adapt to new technologies and environments quickly. In addition to my work in the tech industry, I am also a musician, using my love of music to approach problems and find innovative solutions. Whether I'm working on a software project or composing a new piece, I am always driven to succeed and make a positive impact.
